<a id="class_CodeEdit"></a>

# CodeEdit

**Inherits:** [TextEdit](class_textedit.md) **<** [Control](class_control.md) **<** [CanvasItem](class_canvasitem.md) **<** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A multiline text editor designed for editing code.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

CodeEdit is a specialized [TextEdit](class_textedit.md) designed for editing plain text code files. It has many features commonly found in code editors such as line numbers, line folding, code completion, indent management, and string/comment management.

\ **Note:** Regardless of locale, **CodeEdit** will by default always use left-to-right text direction to correctly display source code.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Signals

<a id="class_CodeEdit_signal_breakpoint_toggled"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**breakpoint_toggled**\ (\ line\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_signal_breakpoint_toggled)

Emitted when a breakpoint is added or removed from a line. If the line is removed via backspace, a signal is emitted at the old line.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_signal_code_completion_requested"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**code_completion_requested**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_signal_code_completion_requested)

Emitted when the user requests code completion. This signal will not be sent if [_request_code_completion()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_private_method__request_code_completion) is overridden or [code_completion_enabled](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_property_code_completion_enabled) is ``false``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_signal_symbol_hovered"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**symbol_hovered**\ (\ symbol\: [String](class_string.md), line\: [int](class_int.md), column\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_signal_symbol_hovered)

Emitted when the user hovers over a symbol. Unlike [Control.mouse_entered](class_control.md#class_Control_signal_mouse_entered), this signal is not emitted immediately, but when the cursor is over the symbol for [ProjectSettings.gui/timers/tooltip_delay_sec](class_projectsettings.md#class_ProjectSettings_property_gui/timers/tooltip_delay_sec) seconds.

\ **Note:** [symbol_tooltip_on_hover](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_property_symbol_tooltip_on_hover) must be ``true`` for this signal to be emitted.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_signal_symbol_lookup"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**symbol_lookup**\ (\ symbol\: [String](class_string.md), line\: [int](class_int.md), column\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_signal_symbol_lookup)

Emitted when the user has clicked on a valid symbol.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_signal_symbol_validate"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**symbol_validate**\ (\ symbol\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_signal_symbol_validate)

Emitted when the user hovers over a symbol. The symbol should be validated and responded to, by calling [set_symbol_lookup_word_as_valid()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_set_symbol_lookup_word_as_valid).

\ **Note:** [symbol_lookup_on_click](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_property_symbol_lookup_on_click) must be ``true`` for this signal to be emitted.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_CodeEdit_CodeCompletionKind"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **CodeCompletionKind**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_CodeEdit_CodeCompletionKind)

<a id="class_CodeEdit_constant_KIND_CLASS"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[CodeCompletionKind](class_codeedit.md#enum_CodeEdit_CodeCompletionKind) **KIND_CLASS** = `0`

Marks the option as a class.<a id="class_CodeEdit_constant_KIND_FUNCTION"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[CodeCompletionKind](class_codeedit.md#enum_CodeEdit_CodeCompletionKind) **KIND_FUNCTION** = `1`

Marks the option as a function.<a id="class_CodeEdit_constant_KIND_SIGNAL"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[CodeCompletionKind](class_codeedit.md#enum_CodeEdit_CodeCompletionKind) **KIND_SIGNAL** = `2`

Marks the option as a Redot signal.<a id="class_CodeEdit_constant_KIND_VARIABLE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[CodeCompletionKind](class_codeedit.md#enum_CodeEdit_CodeCompletionKind) **KIND_VARIABLE** = `3`

Marks the option as a variable.<a id="class_CodeEdit_constant_KIND_MEMBER"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[CodeCompletionKind](class_codeedit.md#enum_CodeEdit_CodeCompletionKind) **KIND_MEMBER** = `4`

Marks the option as a member.<a id="class_CodeEdit_constant_KIND_ENUM"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[CodeCompletionKind](class_codeedit.md#enum_CodeEdit_CodeCompletionKind) **KIND_ENUM** = `5`

Marks the option as an enum entry.<a id="class_CodeEdit_constant_KIND_CONSTANT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[CodeCompletionKind](class_codeedit.md#enum_CodeEdit_CodeCompletionKind) **KIND_CONSTANT** = `6`

Marks the option as a constant.<a id="class_CodeEdit_constant_KIND_NODE_PATH"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[CodeCompletionKind](class_codeedit.md#enum_CodeEdit_CodeCompletionKind) **KIND_NODE_PATH** = `7`

Marks the option as a Redot node path.<a id="class_CodeEdit_constant_KIND_FILE_PATH"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[CodeCompletionKind](class_codeedit.md#enum_CodeEdit_CodeCompletionKind) **KIND_FILE_PATH** = `8`

Marks the option as a file path.<a id="class_CodeEdit_constant_KIND_PLAIN_TEXT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[CodeCompletionKind](class_codeedit.md#enum_CodeEdit_CodeCompletionKind) **KIND_PLAIN_TEXT** = `9`

Marks the option as unclassified or plain text.<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="enum_CodeEdit_CodeCompletionLocation"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **CodeCompletionLocation**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_CodeEdit_CodeCompletionLocation)

<a id="class_CodeEdit_constant_LOCATION_LOCAL"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[CodeCompletionLocation](class_codeedit.md#enum_CodeEdit_CodeCompletionLocation) **LOCATION_LOCAL** = `0`

The option is local to the location of the code completion query - e.g. a local variable. Subsequent value of location represent options from the outer class, the exact value represent how far they are (in terms of inner classes).<a id="class_CodeEdit_constant_LOCATION_PARENT_MASK"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[CodeCompletionLocation](class_codeedit.md#enum_CodeEdit_CodeCompletionLocation) **LOCATION_PARENT_MASK** = `256`

The option is from the containing class or a parent class, relative to the location of the code completion query. Perform a bitwise OR with the class depth (e.g. ``0`` for the local class, ``1`` for the parent, ``2`` for the grandparent, etc.) to store the depth of an option in the class or a parent class.<a id="class_CodeEdit_constant_LOCATION_OTHER_USER_CODE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[CodeCompletionLocation](class_codeedit.md#enum_CodeEdit_CodeCompletionLocation) **LOCATION_OTHER_USER_CODE** = `512`

The option is from user code which is not local and not in a derived class (e.g. Autoload Singletons).<a id="class_CodeEdit_constant_LOCATION_OTHER"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[CodeCompletionLocation](class_codeedit.md#enum_CodeEdit_CodeCompletionLocation) **LOCATION_OTHER** = `1024`

The option is from other engine code, not covered by the other enum constants - e.g. built-in classes.<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_CodeEdit_property_auto_brace_completion_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **auto_brace_completion_enabled** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_property_auto_brace_completion_enabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_auto_brace_completion_enabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_auto_brace_completion_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, uses [auto_brace_completion_pairs](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_property_auto_brace_completion_pairs) to automatically insert the closing brace when the opening brace is inserted by typing or autocompletion. Also automatically removes the closing brace when using backspace on the opening brace.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_property_auto_brace_completion_highlight_matching"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **auto_brace_completion_highlight_matching** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_property_auto_brace_completion_highlight_matching)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_highlight_matching_braces_enabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_highlight_matching_braces_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, highlights brace pairs when the caret is on either one, using [auto_brace_completion_pairs](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_property_auto_brace_completion_pairs). If matching, the pairs will be underlined. If a brace is unmatched, it is colored with [brace_mismatch_color](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_theme_color_brace_mismatch_color).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_property_auto_brace_completion_pairs"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) **auto_brace_completion_pairs** = `{ "\"": "\"", "'": "'", "(": ")", "[": "]", "{": "}" }` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_property_auto_brace_completion_pairs)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_auto_brace_completion_pairs**\ (\ value\: [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md)\ )
- [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) **get_auto_brace_completion_pairs**\ (\ )

Sets the brace pairs to be autocompleted. For each entry in the dictionary, the key is the opening brace and the value is the closing brace that matches it. A brace is a [String](class_string.md) made of symbols. See [auto_brace_completion_enabled](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_property_auto_brace_completion_enabled) and [auto_brace_completion_highlight_matching](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_property_auto_brace_completion_highlight_matching).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_property_code_completion_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **code_completion_enabled** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_property_code_completion_enabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_code_completion_enabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_code_completion_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the [ProjectSettings.input/ui_text_completion_query](class_projectsettings.md#class_ProjectSettings_property_input/ui_text_completion_query) action requests code completion. To handle it, see [_request_code_completion()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_private_method__request_code_completion) or [code_completion_requested](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_signal_code_completion_requested).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_property_code_completion_prefixes"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Array](class_array.md)\[[String](class_string.md)\] **code_completion_prefixes** = `[]` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_property_code_completion_prefixes)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_code_completion_prefixes**\ (\ value\: [Array](class_array.md)\[[String](class_string.md)\]\ )
- [Array](class_array.md)\[[String](class_string.md)\] **get_code_completion_prefixes**\ (\ )

Sets prefixes that will trigger code completion.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_property_delimiter_comments"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Array](class_array.md)\[[String](class_string.md)\] **delimiter_comments** = `[]` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_property_delimiter_comments)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_comment_delimiters**\ (\ value\: [Array](class_array.md)\[[String](class_string.md)\]\ )
- [Array](class_array.md)\[[String](class_string.md)\] **get_comment_delimiters**\ (\ )

Sets the comment delimiters. All existing comment delimiters will be removed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_property_delimiter_strings"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Array](class_array.md)\[[String](class_string.md)\] **delimiter_strings** = `["' '", "\" \""]` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_property_delimiter_strings)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_string_delimiters**\ (\ value\: [Array](class_array.md)\[[String](class_string.md)\]\ )
- [Array](class_array.md)\[[String](class_string.md)\] **get_string_delimiters**\ (\ )

Sets the string delimiters. All existing string delimiters will be removed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_property_gutters_draw_bookmarks"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **gutters_draw_bookmarks** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_property_gutters_draw_bookmarks)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_draw_bookmarks_gutter**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_drawing_bookmarks_gutter**\ (\ )

If ``true``, bookmarks are drawn in the gutter. This gutter is shared with breakpoints and executing lines. See [set_line_as_bookmarked()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_set_line_as_bookmarked).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_property_gutters_draw_breakpoints_gutter"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **gutters_draw_breakpoints_gutter** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_property_gutters_draw_breakpoints_gutter)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_draw_breakpoints_gutter**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_drawing_breakpoints_gutter**\ (\ )

If ``true``, breakpoints are drawn in the gutter. This gutter is shared with bookmarks and executing lines. Clicking the gutter will toggle the breakpoint for the line, see [set_line_as_breakpoint()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_set_line_as_breakpoint).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_property_gutters_draw_executing_lines"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **gutters_draw_executing_lines** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_property_gutters_draw_executing_lines)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_draw_executing_lines_gutter**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_drawing_executing_lines_gutter**\ (\ )

If ``true``, executing lines are marked in the gutter. This gutter is shared with breakpoints and bookmarks. See [set_line_as_executing()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_set_line_as_executing).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_property_gutters_draw_fold_gutter"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **gutters_draw_fold_gutter** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_property_gutters_draw_fold_gutter)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_draw_fold_gutter**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_drawing_fold_gutter**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the fold gutter is drawn. In this gutter, the [can_fold_code_region](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_theme_icon_can_fold_code_region) icon is drawn for each foldable line (see [can_fold_line()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_can_fold_line)) and the [folded_code_region](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_theme_icon_folded_code_region) icon is drawn for each folded line (see [is_line_folded()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_is_line_folded)). These icons can be clicked to toggle the fold state, see [toggle_foldable_line()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_toggle_foldable_line). [line_folding](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_property_line_folding) must be ``true`` to show icons.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_property_gutters_draw_line_numbers"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **gutters_draw_line_numbers** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_property_gutters_draw_line_numbers)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_draw_line_numbers**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_draw_line_numbers_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the line number gutter is drawn. Line numbers start at ``1`` and are incremented for each line of text. Clicking and dragging in the line number gutter will select entire lines of text.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_property_gutters_zero_pad_line_numbers"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **gutters_zero_pad_line_numbers** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_property_gutters_zero_pad_line_numbers)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_line_numbers_zero_padded**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_line_numbers_zero_padded**\ (\ )

If ``true``, line numbers drawn in the gutter are zero padded based on the total line count. Requires [gutters_draw_line_numbers](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_property_gutters_draw_line_numbers) to be set to ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_property_indent_automatic"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **indent_automatic** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_property_indent_automatic)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_auto_indent_enabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_auto_indent_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, an extra indent is automatically inserted when a new line is added and a prefix in [indent_automatic_prefixes](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_property_indent_automatic_prefixes) is found. If a brace pair opening key is found, the matching closing brace will be moved to another new line (see [auto_brace_completion_pairs](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_property_auto_brace_completion_pairs)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_property_indent_automatic_prefixes"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Array](class_array.md)\[[String](class_string.md)\] **indent_automatic_prefixes** = `[":", "{", "[", "("]` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_property_indent_automatic_prefixes)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_auto_indent_prefixes**\ (\ value\: [Array](class_array.md)\[[String](class_string.md)\]\ )
- [Array](class_array.md)\[[String](class_string.md)\] **get_auto_indent_prefixes**\ (\ )

Prefixes to trigger an automatic indent. Used when [indent_automatic](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_property_indent_automatic) is set to ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_property_indent_size"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **indent_size** = `4` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_property_indent_size)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_indent_size**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_indent_size**\ (\ )

Size of the tabulation indent (one :kbd:`Tab` press) in characters. If [indent_use_spaces](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_property_indent_use_spaces) is enabled the number of spaces to use.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_property_indent_use_spaces"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **indent_use_spaces** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_property_indent_use_spaces)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_indent_using_spaces**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_indent_using_spaces**\ (\ )

Use spaces instead of tabs for indentation.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_property_line_folding"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **line_folding** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_property_line_folding)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_line_folding_enabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_line_folding_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, lines can be folded. Otherwise, line folding methods like [fold_line()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_fold_line) will not work and [can_fold_line()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_can_fold_line) will always return ``false``. See [gutters_draw_fold_gutter](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_property_gutters_draw_fold_gutter).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_property_line_length_guidelines"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Array](class_array.md)\[[int](class_int.md)\] **line_length_guidelines** = `[]` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_property_line_length_guidelines)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_line_length_guidelines**\ (\ value\: [Array](class_array.md)\[[int](class_int.md)\]\ )
- [Array](class_array.md)\[[int](class_int.md)\] **get_line_length_guidelines**\ (\ )

Draws vertical lines at the provided columns. The first entry is considered a main hard guideline and is drawn more prominently.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_property_symbol_lookup_on_click"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **symbol_lookup_on_click** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_property_symbol_lookup_on_click)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_symbol_lookup_on_click_enabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_symbol_lookup_on_click_enabled**\ (\ )

Set when a validated word from [symbol_validate](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_signal_symbol_validate) is clicked, the [symbol_lookup](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_signal_symbol_lookup) should be emitted.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_property_symbol_tooltip_on_hover"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **symbol_tooltip_on_hover** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_property_symbol_tooltip_on_hover)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_symbol_tooltip_on_hover_enabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_symbol_tooltip_on_hover_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the [symbol_hovered](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_signal_symbol_hovered) signal is emitted when hovering over a word.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_CodeEdit_private_method__confirm_code_completion"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_confirm_code_completion**\ (\ replace\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_private_method__confirm_code_completion)

Override this method to define how the selected entry should be inserted. If `replace` is ``true``, any existing text should be replaced.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_private_method__filter_code_completion_candidates"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](class_array.md)\[[Dictionary](class_dictionary.md)\] **_filter_code_completion_candidates**\ (\ candidates\: [Array](class_array.md)\[[Dictionary](class_dictionary.md)\]\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_private_method__filter_code_completion_candidates)

Override this method to define what items in `candidates` should be displayed.

Both `candidates` and the return is an [Array](class_array.md) of [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md), see [get_code_completion_option()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_get_code_completion_option) for [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) content.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_private_method__request_code_completion"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **_request_code_completion**\ (\ force\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ ) <span class="virtual">virtual</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_private_method__request_code_completion)

Override this method to define what happens when the user requests code completion. If `force` is ``true``, any checks should be bypassed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_add_auto_brace_completion_pair"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_auto_brace_completion_pair**\ (\ start_key\: [String](class_string.md), end_key\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_add_auto_brace_completion_pair)

Adds a brace pair.

Both the start and end keys must be symbols. Only the start key has to be unique.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_add_code_completion_option"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_code_completion_option**\ (\ type\: [CodeCompletionKind](class_codeedit.md#enum_CodeEdit_CodeCompletionKind), display_text\: [String](class_string.md), insert_text\: [String](class_string.md), text_color\: [Color](class_color.md) = Color(1, 1, 1, 1), icon\: [Resource](class_resource.md) = null, value\: [Variant](class_variant.md) = null, location\: [int](class_int.md) = 1024\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_add_code_completion_option)

Submits an item to the queue of potential candidates for the autocomplete menu. Call [update_code_completion_options()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_update_code_completion_options) to update the list.

\ `location` indicates location of the option relative to the location of the code completion query. See [CodeCompletionLocation](class_codeedit.md#enum_CodeEdit_CodeCompletionLocation) for how to set this value.

\ **Note:** This list will replace all current candidates.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_add_comment_delimiter"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_comment_delimiter**\ (\ start_key\: [String](class_string.md), end_key\: [String](class_string.md), line_only\: [bool](class_bool.md) = false\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_add_comment_delimiter)

Adds a comment delimiter from `start_key` to `end_key`. Both keys should be symbols, and `start_key` must not be shared with other delimiters.

If `line_only` is ``true`` or `end_key` is an empty [String](class_string.md), the region does not carry over to the next line.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_add_string_delimiter"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_string_delimiter**\ (\ start_key\: [String](class_string.md), end_key\: [String](class_string.md), line_only\: [bool](class_bool.md) = false\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_add_string_delimiter)

Defines a string delimiter from `start_key` to `end_key`. Both keys should be symbols, and `start_key` must not be shared with other delimiters.

If `line_only` is ``true`` or `end_key` is an empty [String](class_string.md), the region does not carry over to the next line.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_can_fold_line"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **can_fold_line**\ (\ line\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_can_fold_line)

Returns ``true`` if the given line is foldable. A line is foldable if it is the start of a valid code region (see [get_code_region_start_tag()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_get_code_region_start_tag)), if it is the start of a comment or string block, or if the next non-empty line is more indented (see [TextEdit.get_indent_level()](class_textedit.md#class_TextEdit_method_get_indent_level)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_cancel_code_completion"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **cancel_code_completion**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_cancel_code_completion)

Cancels the autocomplete menu.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_convert_indent"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **convert_indent**\ (\ from_line\: [int](class_int.md) = -1, to_line\: [int](class_int.md) = -1\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_convert_indent)

Converts the indents of lines between `from_line` and `to_line` to tabs or spaces as set by [indent_use_spaces](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_property_indent_use_spaces).

Values of ``-1`` convert the entire text.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_create_code_region"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **create_code_region**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_create_code_region)

Creates a new code region with the selection. At least one single line comment delimiter have to be defined (see [add_comment_delimiter()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_add_comment_delimiter)).

A code region is a part of code that is highlighted when folded and can help organize your script.

Code region start and end tags can be customized (see [set_code_region_tags()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_set_code_region_tags)).

Code regions are delimited using start and end tags (respectively ``region`` and ``endregion`` by default) preceded by one line comment delimiter. (eg. ``#region`` and ``#endregion``)

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_delete_lines"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **delete_lines**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_delete_lines)

Deletes all lines that are selected or have a caret on them.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_do_indent"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **do_indent**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_do_indent)

If there is no selection, indentation is inserted at the caret. Otherwise, the selected lines are indented like [indent_lines()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_indent_lines). Equivalent to the [ProjectSettings.input/ui_text_indent](class_projectsettings.md#class_ProjectSettings_property_input/ui_text_indent) action. The indentation characters used depend on [indent_use_spaces](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_property_indent_use_spaces) and [indent_size](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_property_indent_size).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_duplicate_lines"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **duplicate_lines**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_duplicate_lines)

Duplicates all lines currently selected with any caret. Duplicates the entire line beneath the current one no matter where the caret is within the line.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_duplicate_selection"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **duplicate_selection**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_duplicate_selection)

Duplicates all selected text and duplicates all lines with a caret on them.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_get_code_completion_option"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) **get_code_completion_option**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_get_code_completion_option)

Gets the completion option at `index`. The return [Dictionary](class_dictionary.md) has the following key-values:

\ ``kind``: [CodeCompletionKind](class_codeedit.md#enum_CodeEdit_CodeCompletionKind)\ 

\ ``display_text``: Text that is shown on the autocomplete menu.

\ ``insert_text``: Text that is to be inserted when this item is selected.

\ ``font_color``: Color of the text on the autocomplete menu.

\ ``icon``: Icon to draw on the autocomplete menu.

\ ``default_value``: Value of the symbol.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **is_line_folded**\ (\ line\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_is_line_folded)

Returns ``true`` if the given line is folded. See [fold_line()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_fold_line).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_move_lines_down"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **move_lines_down**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_move_lines_down)

Moves all lines down that are selected or have a caret on them.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_move_lines_up"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **move_lines_up**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_move_lines_up)

Moves all lines up that are selected or have a caret on them.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_remove_comment_delimiter"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_comment_delimiter**\ (\ start_key\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_remove_comment_delimiter)

Removes the comment delimiter with `start_key`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_remove_string_delimiter"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_string_delimiter**\ (\ start_key\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_remove_string_delimiter)

Removes the string delimiter with `start_key`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_request_code_completion"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **request_code_completion**\ (\ force\: [bool](class_bool.md) = false\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_request_code_completion)

Emits [code_completion_requested](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_signal_code_completion_requested), if `force` is ``true`` will bypass all checks. Otherwise will check that the caret is in a word or in front of a prefix. Will ignore the request if all current options are of type file path, node path, or signal.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_set_code_completion_selected_index"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_code_completion_selected_index**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_set_code_completion_selected_index)

Sets the current selected completion option.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_set_code_hint"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_code_hint**\ (\ code_hint\: [String](class_string.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_set_code_hint)

Sets the code hint text. Pass an empty string to clear.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_set_code_hint_draw_below"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_code_hint_draw_below**\ (\ draw_below\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_set_code_hint_draw_below)

If ``true``, the code hint will draw below the main caret. If ``false``, the code hint will draw above the main caret. See [set_code_hint()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_set_code_hint).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_set_code_region_tags"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_code_region_tags**\ (\ start\: [String](class_string.md) = "region", end\: [String](class_string.md) = "endregion"\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_set_code_region_tags)

Sets the code region start and end tags (without comment delimiter).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_set_line_as_bookmarked"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_line_as_bookmarked**\ (\ line\: [int](class_int.md), bookmarked\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_set_line_as_bookmarked)

Sets the given line as bookmarked. If ``true`` and [gutters_draw_bookmarks](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_property_gutters_draw_bookmarks) is ``true``, draws the [bookmark](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_theme_icon_bookmark) icon in the gutter for this line. See [get_bookmarked_lines()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_get_bookmarked_lines) and [is_line_bookmarked()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_is_line_bookmarked).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_set_line_as_breakpoint"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_line_as_breakpoint**\ (\ line\: [int](class_int.md), breakpointed\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_set_line_as_breakpoint)

Sets the given line as a breakpoint. If ``true`` and [gutters_draw_breakpoints_gutter](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_property_gutters_draw_breakpoints_gutter) is ``true``, draws the [breakpoint](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_theme_icon_breakpoint) icon in the gutter for this line. See [get_breakpointed_lines()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_get_breakpointed_lines) and [is_line_breakpointed()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_is_line_breakpointed).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_set_line_as_executing"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_line_as_executing**\ (\ line\: [int](class_int.md), executing\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_set_line_as_executing)

Sets the given line as executing. If ``true`` and [gutters_draw_executing_lines](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_property_gutters_draw_executing_lines) is ``true``, draws the [executing_line](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_theme_icon_executing_line) icon in the gutter for this line. See [get_executing_lines()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_get_executing_lines) and [is_line_executing()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_is_line_executing).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_set_symbol_lookup_word_as_valid"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_symbol_lookup_word_as_valid**\ (\ valid\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_set_symbol_lookup_word_as_valid)

Sets the symbol emitted by [symbol_validate](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_signal_symbol_validate) as a valid lookup.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_toggle_foldable_line"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **toggle_foldable_line**\ (\ line\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_toggle_foldable_line)

Toggle the folding of the code block at the given line.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_toggle_foldable_lines_at_carets"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **toggle_foldable_lines_at_carets**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_toggle_foldable_lines_at_carets)

Toggle the folding of the code block on all lines with a caret on them.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_unfold_all_lines"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **unfold_all_lines**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_unfold_all_lines)

Unfolds all lines that are folded.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_unfold_line"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **unfold_line**\ (\ line\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_unfold_line)

Unfolds the given line if it is folded or if it is hidden under a folded line.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_unindent_lines"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **unindent_lines**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_unindent_lines)

Unindents all lines that are selected or have a caret on them. Uses spaces or a tab depending on [indent_use_spaces](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_property_indent_use_spaces). Equivalent to the [ProjectSettings.input/ui_text_dedent](class_projectsettings.md#class_ProjectSettings_property_input/ui_text_dedent) action. See [indent_lines()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_indent_lines).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CodeEdit_method_update_code_completion_options"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **update_code_completion_options**\ (\ force\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_CodeEdit_method_update_code_completion_options)

Submits all completion options added with [add_code_completion_option()](class_codeedit.md#class_CodeEdit_method_add_code_completion_option). Will try to force the autocomplete menu to popup, if `force` is ``true``.

\ **Note:** This will replace all current candidates.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">
